title: Drawing, "Dice Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
description: Against a black background, white dice at center and smaller sections of the dice at four corners.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Dice Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-47.
